org.forgerock.openam.session.service.access.persistence

Class SessionPersistenceStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.session.service.access.persistence.SessionPersistenceStore

  • public class SessionPersistenceStore
extends Object
    This class is responsible for loading sessions from the CTS.

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public void create(InternalSession session)
            throws CoreTokenException
        Persist the provided session to the CTS, or update it if it is already there.
        Parameters:
        session - The session to persist.
        Throws:
        CoreTokenException - If the operation fails.

      • update

        public void update(InternalSession session)
            throws CoreTokenException
        Throws:
        CoreTokenException

      • delete

        public void delete(SessionID sessionID)
            throws CoreTokenException
        Remove the provided session from the CTS.
        Parameters:
        sessionID - The id of the session to delete from the CTS.
        Throws:
        CoreTokenException - If the operation fails.

      • recoverSession

        public InternalSession recoverSession(SessionID sessionID)
        This will recover the specified session from the repository based on the provided session id. Returns null if no session was recovered.
        Parameters:
        sessionID - Session ID

      • recoverSessionByHandle

        public InternalSession recoverSessionByHandle(String sessionHandle)
        This will recover the specified session from the repository based on the provided session handle. Returns null if no session was recovered.
        Parameters:
        sessionHandle - Session Handle

      • searchPartialSessions

        public Collection<PartialSession> searchPartialSessions(CrestQuery crestQuery)
                                                 throws CoreTokenException
        Return partial sessions matching the provided CREST query filter from the CTS servers.
        Parameters:
        crestQuery - The CREST query based on which we should look for matching sessions.
        Returns:
        The collection of matching partial sessions.
        Throws:
        CoreTokenException - If the partial query CTS call fails.

      • getByRestrictedID

        public InternalSession getByRestrictedID(SessionID sessionID)
        Get a restricted session from a given SessionID.
        Parameters:
        sessionID - the ID of the restricted session to retrieve
        Returns:
        a restricted Internal Session

      • getAllSessionsByUUID

        public Map<String,Long> getAllSessionsByUUID(String uuid)
                                      throws SessionException
        Returns the expiration information of all sessions belonging to a user (uuid). The returned value will be a Map (sid->expiration_time).
        Parameters:
        uuid - User's universal unique ID.
        Returns:
        user Sessions
        Throws:
        SessionException - if there is any problem with accessing the session repository.

      • getValidSessions

        public Collection<InternalSession> getValidSessions()
                                             throws CoreTokenException
        Returns all the valid sessions from the CTS server
        Returns:
        The collection of all valid sessions
        Throws:
        CoreTokenException - if the call to CTS to get valid session fails

                            throws CoreTokenException
        Throws:
        CoreTokenException
